papers.title: Scaling Laws For Precision
papers.abstract: We investigate how model precision affects scaling laws in language models, finding that lower precision can lead to more efficient scaling while maintaining performance.

papers.title: Critique-out-Loud Reward Models
papers.abstract: We propose a novel approach to reward modeling that leverages explicit verbalization of critiques to improve model alignment.

papers.title: Vid3D: Synthesis of Dynamic 3D Scenes using 2D Video Diffusion
papers.abstract: We present a method for generating dynamic 3D scenes by leveraging 2D video diffusion models, enabling high-quality 3D content creation.

papers.title: Perplexed by Perplexity: Perplexity-Based Data Pruning With Small Reference Models
papers.abstract: We explore using small reference models to guide data pruning decisions, showing that perplexity-based filtering can be effective even with limited computational resources.

papers.title: Hydra: Sequentially-Dependent Draft Heads for Medusa Decoding
papers.abstract: We introduce a novel approach to speculative decoding that leverages sequential dependencies between draft heads to improve generation speed.

papers.title: Striped Attention: Faster Ring Attention for Causal Transformers
papers.abstract: We propose a more efficient variant of ring attention that reduces memory usage while maintaining model performance.

papers.title: Dynamic Masking Rate Schedules for MLM Pretraining
papers.abstract: We investigate how varying masking rates during pretraining affects model performance, finding that dynamic schedules can improve learning efficiency.

papers.title: 3D Neural Field Generation using Triplane Diffusion
papers.abstract: We present a novel approach to 3D content generation using diffusion models operating on triplane representations.

papers.title: The Effect of Data Dimensionality on Neural Network Prunability
papers.abstract: We study how the dimensionality of training data affects the ability to prune neural networks while maintaining performance.

papers.title: EntailSum: An Entailment-Based Approach to Aspect-Based Text Summarization with Automated Aspect Adaptation
papers.abstract: We propose a novel approach to aspect-based summarization that leverages entailment relationships to improve summary quality and adaptability.
